name: Banked's Sample Store
description: A simple Nuxt.js powered webstore that demonstrates how to implement Banked's hosted checkout

BANKED_API_KEY.description: Your Banked API key generated in the Banked console

BANKED_API_SECRET.description: The Banked API secret generated in the Banked console

BASE_URL.description: The base url of the store, which is used to construct callback URL's Banked will direct to e.g. https://www.example.com/

PAYEE_NAME.description: The name of the account holder where payments will be made e.g. 'Example Ltd.' or 'Lisa Frank

ACCOUNT_NUMBER.description: The 8 digit account number for payments to be made into

SORT_CODE.description: The 6 digit sort code for the bank account to be paid, with no hyhons
